distinct
'true' as QUERYID,
from ZM_RETURN_DATA

COURIER_NUMBER, SEND_TIME, CTM_NAME, CTM_BAR_CODE, PROVINCE, ADDRESS, DELIVERY_STATE, SIGNATORY, ADDRESSEE, SIGN_TIME, ABNORMAL_CAUSE, ORDER_NUMBER, SHOP_NUMBER, PHONE, WEIGHT, COURIER_COMPANY, GOODS, GOODS_COST, FEE, UPDATE_TIME, LARGE_AREA, SLICE_AREA, FENBU, CREATE_DATE, FBD_AREA, SIGN_PORT,TIME_OUT
mapper.select:
select count(courier_number) from ZM_RETURN_DATA
and SEND_TIME >= #{date1}
and SEND_TIME <= #{date2}
and CTM_BAR_CODE in (${str1})
and CTM_BAR_CODE in (${str2})
and COURIER_NUMBER in (${str3})
and LARGE_AREA like '%${str4}%'
and ORDER_NUMBER like '%${str5}%'
and SLICE_AREA like '%${str7}%'
and FENBU like '%${str8}%'
and FBD_AREA like '%${str9}%'
and PROVINCE like '%${str10}%'
and SHOP_NUMBER like '%${str11}%'
and ADDRESS like '%${str12}%'
and COURIER_STATE = #{int1}
and ( LARGE_AREA is not null or slice_area is not null or fenbu is not null or fbd_area is not null or ctm_bar_code is not null or send_time is not null or weight is not null or province is not null )

select from ZM_RETURN_DATA
COURIER_NUMBER = #{str1}
order by ${sort} ${order},UPDATE_TIME desc
order by UPDATE_TIME desc

select * from ( select t1.*,rownum rn from ( select from ZM_RETURN_DATA
and SEND_TIME >= #{date1}
and SEND_TIME <= #{date2}
and CTM_BAR_CODE in (${str1})
and DELIVERY_STATE in (${str2})
and COURIER_NUMBER in (${str3})
and CTM_BAR_CODE in (${str4})
and ORDER_NUMBER like '%${str5}%'
and SHOP_NUMBER like '%${str6}%'
and LARGE_AREA like '%${str8}%'
and SLICE_AREA like '%${str9}%'
and FENBU like '%${str10}%'
and FBD_AREA like '%${str11}%'
and CTM_NAME like '%${str12}%'
and PROVINCE like '%${str13}%'
and SIGN_PORT like '%${str14}%'
and ADDRESS like '%${str15}%'
and (case when DELIVERY_STATE='配送成功' and sign_time>time_out then 1 when DELIVERY_STATE in ('配送中','揽件') and sysdate>time_out then 1 when DELIVERY_STATE='配送成功' and sign_time <= time_out then 0 when DELIVERY_STATE in ('配送中','揽件') and sysdate <= time_out then 0 else 2 end)=#{int1}
and ( delivery_state is not null or sign_time is not null or sign_port is not null )
order by ${sort} ${order},UPDATE_TIME desc
order by UPDATE_TIME desc
) t1
rownum <= #{end}
)
rn > #{start}

select count(courier_number) from ZM_RETURN_DATA
and SEND_TIME >= #{date1}
and SEND_TIME <= #{date2}
and CTM_BAR_CODE in (${str1})
and DELIVERY_STATE in (${str2})
and COURIER_NUMBER in (${str3})
and CTM_BAR_CODE in (${str4})
and ORDER_NUMBER like '%${str5}%'
and SHOP_NUMBER like '%${str6}%'
and LARGE_AREA like '%${str8}%'
and SLICE_AREA like '%${str9}%'
and FENBU like '%${str10}%'
and FBD_AREA like '%${str11}%'
and CTM_NAME like '%${str12}%'
and PROVINCE like '%${str13}%'
and SIGN_PORT like '%${str14}%'
and ADDRESS like '%${str15}%'
and (case when DELIVERY_STATE='配送成功' and sign_time>time_out then 1 when DELIVERY_STATE in ('配送中','揽件') and sysdate>time_out then 1 when DELIVERY_STATE='配送成功' and sign_time <= time_out then 0 when DELIVERY_STATE in ('配送中','揽件') and sysdate <= time_out then 0 else 2 end)=#{int1}
and ( delivery_state is not null or sign_time is not null or sign_port is not null )

select from ZM_RETURN_DATA
COURIER_NUMBER = #{str1}
order by ${sort} ${order},UPDATE_TIME desc
order by UPDATE_TIME desc
